item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump threatens to ignite era of trade wars with new tariffs
2. Canada should respond to Trump with tariffs on Musk’s Teslas, Freeland says
3. Ex-Goldman analyst ordered to pay £587,000 for insider dealing
4. [Opinion] Lagarde and Von der Leyen: Europe has got the message on change
5. AstraZeneca ditches plan to build £450mn UK vaccine plant
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
